member.name: P:Buckaroo.DataRequestBase.StartRecurrent
member.summary: Defines if a transaction should initiate a recurrent transaction. Some services support recurring payments (You can identify these by determining if they support the action PayRecurrent). Before being able to do a recurrent payment, a normal payment needs to be made with this field set to true (the default value for this field is false).

member.name: P:Buckaroo.DataRequestBase.ContinueOnIncomplete
member.summary: Defines a value that states wheter the request should be aborted, or that the user should be redirected in case the request is incomplete.

member.name: P:Buckaroo.DataRequestBase.ServicesSelectableByClient
member.summary: If no primary service is provided and ContinueOnIncomplete is set, this list of comma separated servicescodes can be used to limit the number of services from which the customer may choose once he is redirected to the payment form. Only services which are entered in this field are selectable. This field is optional and when empty or missing, the customer may choose any of the available services

member.name: P:Buckaroo.DataRequestBase.ServicesExcludedForClient
member.summary: If no primary service is provided and ContinueOnIncomplete is set, this list of comma separated servicescodes can be used to limit the number of services from which the customer may choose once he is redirected to the payment form. Services which are entered in this field are not selectable. This field is optional.

member.name: P:Buckaroo.DataRequestBase.PushUrl
member.summary: When provided, this push URL overrides all the push URLs as configured in the payment plaza under websites for the associated website key.

member.name: P:Buckaroo.DataRequestBase.PushUrlFailure
member.summary: When provided, this push URL overrides the push URL for failed transactions as configured in the payment plaza under websites for the associated website key.

member.name: T:Buckaroo.PayPerEmailPaymentInvitationRequest
member.summary: The PayperEmail Payment invitation is a request that has the purpos of sending a payment invitation to a customer. This can be performed by Buckaroo, or a payment link can be returned, in case the mail should be sent by your own system. The payment link is the key element of the PayperEmail and is the link to the Buckaroo Payment Engine.

member.name: P:Buckaroo.PayPerEmailPaymentInvitationRequest.CustomerGender
member.summary:
The gender of the customer, used to properly address the customer in the mail. Possible values are:
0 : Unknown 1 : Male 2 : Female 9 : Not applicable
To be sure that always one of these values are used, the corresponding class with gender constants can be used.

member.name: P:Buckaroo.PayPerEmailPaymentInvitationRequest.Attachment
member.summary: The file name of a previously uploaded attachment.

member.name: P:Buckaroo.PayPerEmailPaymentInvitationRequest.MerchantSendsEmail
member.summary: Defines if Buckaroo has to send the payperemail, or that you wish to get only the paylink returned. when true, the paylink is returned in the response, and Buckaroo will not send the email.

member.name: P:Buckaroo.PayPerEmailPaymentInvitationRequest.ExpirationDate
member.summary: The date you wish to have the PayperEmail expired.

member.name: P:Buckaroo.PayPerEmailPaymentInvitationRequest.PaymentMethodsAllowed
member.summary: A single or multiple payment methods which the consumer is offered as a choice on the payment page. If no payment methods are defined here, all active payment methods within the merchant account are shown.
